# Pull Request

## Description
<!-- Describe your changes in detail -->

## Type of Change
<!-- Mark relevant options with an [x] -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Test updates

## Testing

### Unit Tests
- [ ] All existing tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Coverage meets 80%+ threshold (`npm run test:coverage`)

### E2E Tests
- [ ] E2E tests pass (`npm run test:e2e`)
- [ ] New E2E tests added if UI changed

### Manual Testing
- [ ] Tested locally in development mode
- [ ] Tested edge cases
- [ ] Verified accessibility (keyboard navigation, screen readers)

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined (`npm run type-check`)
- [ ] Tests pass with no regressions
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Security considerations addressed (XSS, injection attacks, etc.)
